name: Animal Paradise
description:
'Animal Paradise' is a life-simulation video game that features the player taking care of a variety of animals. Originally released in Japan as 'Hana Deka Club' (はなデカ倶楽部) during 2007, it is based on Japanese photographer Yoneo Morita's pictures of real life animals. It received a sequel centralized on wildlife in 2009.

Feed your new best friends, clean them, walk them, play with them and keep them happy to earn their love and loyalty. Featuring Yoneo Morita’s renowned (Big Nose) style of animal photography, adorable animal fanatics of all ages will love this exciting collection of 18 different furry friends. Take great photographs of your pet friends, collect the pictures and complete your photo album.
